name: RideOp - Thrill Ride Simulator
description: RideOp puts you in control of some of the biggest and most thrilling theme park rides in the world. Give all your guests the most unforgettable experience! With full control of the ride's motion, you can offer a unique journey every ride. Now it's your turn to create thrilling experiences!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher Processor: Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 5750 1Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVidia Geforce 640 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher Processor: Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X 2Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVIDIA 760 series 2Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
